TopicTitle: Ksp's Music in Reggie Watts show?

Articles.Content:
Check it out and tell me if this is from ksp

Its on netflix, look up Reggie Watts: Why $#!+ So Crazy?

Its the part about 2:15seconds in, when hes walking out of the room into the hallway.. between the two doors i swear that its the "congratulations you're now in space" music.

It's also a pretty dope show..

But could someone else that has netflix verify this for me real quick?

Much of the music in KSP comes from Kevin Macleod (http://incompetech.com/music/royalty-free) and is royalty free, meaning that many people can use it. Im not surprised that other people are using the music.
Ahh, makes sense. Was kinda surprising to me.

If you like finding things that many people use, keep an ear out for the wilhelm scream (

) and there is also an alarm sound effect that I continue to hear in many films.
